title: Belle & Austin "Islands In The Stream" Duet | AHS: Double Feature - Episode 1: "Cape Fear" (HQ Clip)
author: AHS Crave
comment: I’ll not mention how many times I’ve rewatched this scene🫂🖤
this character frances is playing is huge. it already deserves an emmy
I was honestly so baked when I watched this episode I kind of thought I'd hallucinated this....so glad it exists.
it's so cool that after so many seasons the musical numbers return, this scene is ICONIC
THEY ARE SO CUTE TOGETHER SOB (platonic)
description: "Cape Fear", the season premiere of American Horror Story: Double Feature (Part 1 - Red Tide) - written by Ryan Murphy & Brad Falchuk, directed by John J. Gray - stars Sarah Paulson as Tuberculosis Karen, Evan Peters as Austin Sommers, Lily Rabe as Doris Gardener, Finn Wittrock as Harry Gardener, Ryan Kiera Armstrong as Alma Gardener, Frances Conroy as Belle Noir, Billie Lourd as Lark, Leslie Grossman as Ursula, Adina Porter as Chief Burelson, Angelica Ross as The Chemist, Macaulay Culkin as Mickey, Denis O'Hare as Holden, and Robin Weigert as Martha. All rights belong to FX Networks and Ryan Murphy Television. Song: "Islands In The Stream"
